isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - ATA COMMUNICATIONS - POSITIVE AND NEGATIVE ATA DATA LINKS

svcproc.title: POSITIVE AND NEGATIVE ATA DATA LINKS
svcproc.para: The RED Positive and BLUE Negative Data Link Busses connect the EST connector (384) to the ECM. They are also the connection point for other electronic components that require access to the engine control system through the ATA communications link.
